question:
Which among the following was the objective of setting up the Calcutta Madrasah and the Sanskrit College of Benaras?
1. To provide skilled Indians to the administrative service
2. To provide education of classical language
3. To provide education of vernacular language
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The main objective of setting up the Calcutta Madrasah (1781) and the Sanskrit College (1791) was to provide skilled Indians to the administrative service, to provide education of classical language and vernacular language.
